name: Jordan Klepper
monologue: before he even takes office

name: Jordan Klepper
monologue: You traded a cyber-crime kingpin for public schoolteacher Marc Fogel? This is like if the Dallas Mavericks traded Luka Dončić for public schoolteacher Marc Fogel.

name: Jordan Klepper
monologue: Also, Americans, stop smoking weed in Russia. If you need to relax, try not being in Russia.

name: Jordan Klepper
monologue: I’d like to know what those ‘various other subjects’ were. It’s a tad suspicious. It’s like a husband coming back from a Vegas bachelor party saying, ‘Yeah, we ate some great food, saw the Sphere, did some… various other things. Anyway, you should get a prescription for Valtrex.'

name: Jordan Klepper
monologue: But Trump won’t be going into this alone. He also has Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth, a man who does not take no for an answer, according to police reports.

name: Jordan Klepper
monologue: Okay, so before negotiations even start, America gave up the two things Russia most wants? How do Hegseth and Trump not know how to negotiate? Between the two of them, they’ve been divorced 97 times.

name: Jordan Klepper
monologue: If your opening move is giving away the house, the car, and the kids, best case scenario, you’re leaving court with half of a golden retriever. I mean, no one’s going to be happy about that except maybe RFK Jr.

name: Jordan Klepper
monologue: an equal partner” in peace talks] “Imagine not being invited to your own peace negotiations. It’s like if your wife told you she wanted a threesome and then asked what nights you’ll be away on business.

name: Jordan Klepper
monologue: not a good war to get into

name: Jordan Klepper
monologue: Yeah, performing arts centers have gotten very woke-y. Like that one theater that kicked out Lauren Boebert for giving one little tug-job.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: I can’t wait for the next Kennedy Center Honors to feature Kid Rock, Lee Greenwood, and Big Mouth Billy Bass.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: hot”] “You didn’t make the presidency hot unless you mean hot like a low-grade fever. Or hot like when it’s snowing so you wear a big puffy coat but you’re on the subway and it’s packed, so sweat runs down your back into your butt crack. If that’s what you mean, then yeah, man, you made it hot.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: Every time Trump speaks, I feel like a guy who started season two of Severance without watching season one.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: What could the richest man in the world, with a defense contract and a car company and a rocket company and a medical device company and a social media company and ties to foreign governments and large crypto holdings possibly have to gain from having direct control over the federal government? Okay, this time I am being sarcastic.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: a daily colonoscopy” by federal investigators] “You do? Is that why you’re always making this face? He looks uncomfortable but also… intrigued.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Russia was like, ‘Well, you drive a hard bargain, Mister Trump. Tell you what, throw in everything else we want and you have a deal.'

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Honestly, it’s amazing the guy only bankrupted three casinos.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Trump said that he and Putin will work together to end the war in Ukraine. Which is like E. Coli and Ex-Lax working together to end diarrhea.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: If successful, this will send a strong message to the rest of the world, which is that if you attack and murder our allies, it will make no difference at all.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: there are a lot of forks in this game

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: We’re like one weird press conference away from Trump saying he wants to move Ukraine to Gaza.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Putin’s gonna squeeze Trump’s balls like a schnauzer at the Westminster Dog Show.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: RFK Jr is now charge of the FDA, NIH, and CDC. To which Americans said, ‘OMG,’ ‘WTF?,’ and ‘FML.’

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Earlier tonight, Melania was like, ‘Did you forget again?’ And Trump said, ‘No, I got Elon something.'

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Apple just announced that they’re about to introduce ‘the newest member of the family.’ This is what happens when you don’t use Apple’s protection plan.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Disney announced that they’re adding a new final verse to the ‘It’s a Small World’ song on the Disneyland ride. They’re doing it for everyone who got on the ride and thought, ‘I just wish this song was longer.'
